body:
Before using this service you must attend a [MIAM]({app:urls:url:professional-mediation}), unless [you're exempt]({app:urls:url:miams-exemptions}).

The MIAM will assess if mediation is right for you and whether you can agree arrangements out of court.

[Find out more about mediation]({app:urls:url:professional-mediation})
heading: Attend a Mediation Information and Assessment Meeting (MIAM)
